discussion.content:
The three capabilities of Collaborative Forecasting are:

B. Forecast using opportunity splits: Collaborative Forecasting allows sales teams to use opportunity splits to divide credit for a sale among multiple team members. This helps to accurately forecast revenue based on each team member's contributions to the sale.

C. Overlay quota: Collaborative Forecasting allows managers to overlay a quota on top of the forecast, which helps them to identify areas where the team is falling short and take corrective action before the end of the sales period.

E. Select a default forecast currency setting: Collaborative Forecasting allows users to select a default forecast currency setting, which ensures that all forecasts are consistent and can be easily compared across different regions or currencies.

choices.D: Do NOT allow deletion of a lookup record that is part of a lookup relationship
choices.C: Clear the value of the lookup field
choices.B: Prompt the user to enter another record to resolve the lookup relationship

discussion.content:
A. Delete the related record also, C. Clear the value of the lookup field, D. Do NOT allow deletion of a lookup record that is part of a lookup relationship.

When a lookup relationship is created between two objects, the administrator can select options to control what happens when a lookup record is deleted.

"Delete the related record also" option will delete the child records as well when the parent record is deleted.
"Clear the value of the lookup field" option will remove the reference from the lookup field, but the child record remains.
"Do NOT allow deletion of a lookup record that is part of a lookup relationship" option will prevent users from deleting a lookup record that has child records associated with it.
I think only C,D available as options as of 2022/March
